entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 PublishReadyToRun causes crash when publishing, but it worked on .NET 6 #78278
  • dotnet test crashes - Win7 + .NET 7 - Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E #78277
  • Inconsistently thrown exceptions in System.IO #78276
  • Socket multicast loopback does not work on IPv6 sockets on Linux #78275
  • Too wide memory load causes System.AccessViolationException on x64 and ARM64 platforms #78272
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 application crash with unmanaged PAL_SEHException #78271
  • Access Violation assigning ref readonly field #78268
  • JIT: Potentially quadratic behavior in EH clause handling #78267
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: INumberBase<TSelf>.TryCreate* #78266
  • System.IO.Compression bug #78264
  • ARM64: Missing combine eor+lsr and duplicate constant reloads #78263

Closed

  • Type 'Program' can be sealed because it has no subtypes in its containing assembly and is not externally visible #78270
  • Huge Breaking Issue in Net7 with MemberInfo equality #78218
    8.0.0
  • .NET X509Chain.Build() works on one Windows system but not another #78254
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility 6.0.1 cause CVE-2022-41064 issue #78227
  • Cannot use generic attributes on a struct in Blazor WASM #78255
  • build libs with `/p:Deterministic=true` some libraray make diff #76774
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Mono musl support (backport #76500) #78274
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Mono musl support (backport #76500) #78273
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • SIMDify ToLowerInvariant/ToUpperInvariant #78262
  • fix DualMode ReceiveFrom on macOS #78261
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • [EXPERIMENT] Asg cast opt rationalization #78260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial JIT test merging #78259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix Equals in hot reload scenario #78258
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Delete `fgMorphBlockOperand` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix Equals in hot reload scenario #78249
    area-System.Reflection

Updated

  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Forcing auto binding redirects on Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests to fix test issue. #78250
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAny in IndexOfHtmlAttributeEncodingChars #78240
    area-System.Net
  • Use `FIELD_ADDR` for all `ldflda`s #78226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete some `ADDR`-related code #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify `impAssignStruct[Ptr]` and `gtNewBlkOpNode` #78252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] React to CheckForOverflowUnderflow in regex source generator #78256
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix mono dotnet creation #78257
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Diagnosing failures #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #78213
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Disable Reflection, IL scanner, RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #1992

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a couple of things #2080
    area-green-threads

Merged

  • Fix a few things regarding EC, await, and thread pool local queuing #2067
  • Fix yield #2079
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: bring IL backend inline with scanner - use unconstructed type for unbox #2075

Updated

  • Split RyuJit backend into multiple files #2077

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_DoesNotReadConsoleIn_InNonInteractiveMode #29047
  • Re-enable Microsoft.DotNet.Watcher.Tools.NoDepsAppTests.RestartProcessThatTerminatesAfterFileChange #29046

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29036
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Retarget Microsoft.Extensions.DotNetDeltaApplier to netstandard2.1 #28984
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename constantly failing in MAUI Apps #65397
  • DocumentationCommentId parser throws IndexOutOfRangeException when parsing type parameter symbol in invalid ID #65396
  • Cover VisualStudioSettingsOptionPersister with tests #65394
  • [Compatibility issue] VB compiler generates tons of BC36954 errors when I upgrade .NET 6 projects to .NET 7 #65392
  • Provide separate `yield return` and `yield break` completions instead of a single `yield` #65390
  • Another Round of Milestone Cleanup #65389
  • incorrect ref escape check for expression body #65388

Closed

  • The equal symbols have a different hash code #65393
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Common depends on a very old version of System.Composition #45617
    Backlog
  • `Fix return type` introduces compiler error #65302
  • ExternalReferences.Lenght equals 0 on macOS #25222
    Backlog
  • A lot of allocations coming in from SourceNamespaceSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences #33129
    Backlog
  • ArgumentNullException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.AnalyzerExecutor.ExecuteBlockActionsCore #59988
    17.5 P1
  • CS1591 - False positive for interface-implementing member #65386
  • IDE0018 C# Variable declaration can be inlined shown when variable declaration cannot be inlined #50530
    Backlog
  • Constributer pain: Test discovery takes 20 minutes to finish #51208
    Backlog
  • C# Editor, Convert to Hex refactoring unexpected limitations #51821
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct `Nullable<T>.Equals()` calls in `BoundNode.Update()` #65398
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65385
    Area-Compilers
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Better infer tuple type for `Fix return type` codefix #65335
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, OnDeckForServicing, Next
  • Fix Package Dependencies For NuGet #65315
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Implicitly-typed lambda parameters have RefKind.None #65350
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65382
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community, 17.5
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Complete all foreach binding checks despite LangVer check #65366
    Area-Compilers
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • Add a separate option to control solution crawler's support of generators #65268
    Area-IDE
  • Fix bug in partial solutions after a document was removed and added #65349
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The certificate chain was issued by an authority that is not trusted. #45053
  • ProblemDetailsService Should Evaluate Writers In Reverse #45052
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Is Not RFC 7231 Compliant #45051
  • @bind:after is not working #45050
  • error NETSDK1047: Assets file 'project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net7.0/linux-x64' #45049
  • UserManager.ResetPasswordAsync causes entity to be tracked a second time #45048
  • How to validate services in minimal api? #45047
  • Blazor WebAssembly KeyboardEventArgs keys Unidentified on mobile browsers #45046
  • HttpResponse Doesn't Allow Negative Value for Cookie Max-Age #45045

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes_nodejs, json_netty #44875
  • Blazor @bind:after not working on .NET 7 RTM release #44957
  • Perf improvement: json, single_query #44980
  • How remove a configuration provider in ASP.NET 6 minimap api? #45043

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove array allocation from multi-span header parsing #45044
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel

Updated

  • [Blazor] Workaround linker regression #45028
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2043729 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime

Issues

Updated

  • Debugging a self-contained app locks its mscordbi.dll #3081
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net maui android app crashes when deployed to google play closed testing #11316
  • ScrollView doesn't center its content. #11315
  • Lowercase char in Entry with TextTransform=Uppercase moves carret to the beginning #11313
  • The default MAUI application created by Visual Studio on the Apple M1 platform cannot launch the Android emulator #11312
  • Label TextType="Html" Crash in Windows if html is "Broken" #11311
  • Maui Android Crash CarouselView IndicatorView on navigating second time #11310
  • [iOS] Shell.TitleView doesn't show accurate if not using just a string binding #11309
  • TextArea is not working (Maui Blazor) #11308
  • Navigating backward produces "Pending Navigations still processing" exception #11307
  • FileSystem.AppDataDirectory get different path between debug and deployed #11306
  • No ios simulator in Visual Studio Mac #11305
  • .Net MAUI conversion of SVG text into PNG is incorrect. #11302
  • .NET MAUI Windows content escapes window into toolbar #11300

Closed

  • Changes not re-rendering in Hot Reload #11066

PullRequests

Created

  • Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #11314
    community ✨

Merged

  • Add 7.0 (GA) to the list #11294

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12

Issues

Created

  • EF Core 7 no longer logs errors from database commands #29543

Closed

  • DesignTimeServices recommended way to modify scaffolding output #29540

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • After installing .Net Desktop Runtime 7 OS claims its not installed. #14975

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #14974

Merged
